column5: Im trying to buy an inflatable PFD. I keep seeing the diffrent gram ratings. I am told that is the size of the Co2 cartridg needed. I would guess that the larger cartridge is for a larger person. If that is right what do I need for a 200-250 person?

Only use the re-arm kits recommended by the manufacturer. Many companies have diff kits available depending on the inflatable product being used. Here is a chart you can check.http://www.inflatablepfd.com/aktable.html
